Attributes.description: An examination in depth of a selected area of theatre history, theory or practice. Topics will change from year to year. May be repeated for credit when topics differ.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: (6 credits of THTR at the 300-level or above.)
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Thu, Start Time: 9:30, End Time: 12:30, Building: Orchard, Room: Commons
